message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great fit for you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1,100,000. This is a great price considering the value it brings to your business.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate you being willing to negotiate.  I'm interested in the product, but I'm only able to offer $950,000 at this time.  This is a fair price considering my budget and the value I see in the product.  Let me know what you think.

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I appreciate your honesty about your budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $1,025,000. This is a fair compromise considering the value the product brings to your business.
